typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> hlpExchRate
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> dimCurrency

	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
